headline: What to expect from legacy media stocks as Q2 earnings season is set to start
summary: Investing.com -- Legacy media stocks may offer modest upside this earnings season, but investor focus is likely to center more on strategic breakups and deal-making than on quarterly fundamentals, according to Barclays.
